title: Book, change and cancel theory tests for your trainee instructors

details.description: Book, change and cancel approved driving instructor (ADI) part 1 tests for your trainee instructors using the trainer booking facility
details.more_information:
You’ll also need the following from the Driving Standards Agency (DSA):

- business ID
- username
- password

You can book test slots up to 3 months in advance. You won’t have to give the candidate’s details when you book the tests.

% You must confirm the details of the candidate taking the test by 4pm a full working day before the test, eg by 4pm on Wednesday if the test is on Friday. %

^ Sundays and public holidays are not counted as working days. ^

##Cancel or change a test

You must give at least 3 clear working days notice when cancelling or changing a test to get a refund.

##Data protection

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for DSA](/dsa-driving-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for DSA") before you start.

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
details.introduction: Book and manage the approved driving instructor part 1 test for your trainee instructors. You’ll need to be [registered to use the trainer booking facility](/register-book-driving-tests-trainer-or-business "Register as DSA trainer booker") for theory tests.

details.description: Becoming an instructor, applying for licences, booking tests and rules

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
